tipsData.tipDesc:
Bloating is an extremely common problem amongst women today.

There are many reasons why you may feel bloated, and they're not just ones you think: Dehydration, eat
Your glutes are biggest muscle on your body & it is also the most neglected due to job and school that require you sit on your booty all day. Activating your glutes everyday is really important.

Carbs are the body's main source of fuel and easily used by the body for energy.

They breakdown glucose which is tha main source of energy. They are stored in the muscles & liver for a later

Vitamins are substance that your body need to grow and develop normally.

They breakdown glucose which is the main source of energy. They are stored in the muscles & liver for a later
